column1: Ten-year survival for 2005-2006 and 2010-2011 is predicted using an excess hazard statistical model
Please include the citation provided in our Frequently Asked Questions when reproducing this chart: http://info.cancerresearchuk.org/cancerstats/faqs/#How
Survival estimates were provided on request by the Cancer Research UK Cancer Survival Group at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine. http://www.lshtm.ac.uk/eph/ncde/cancersurvival/
